Plot: A collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A. A. Milne.
Writer: A.A. Milne (books), Larry Clemmons (story), Ralph Wright (story), Vance Gerry (story), Xavier Atencio (story), Ken Anderson (story), Julius Svendsen (story), Ted Berman (story), Eric Cleworth (story), Winston Hibler (story supervisor "Blustery Day")
Title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
Actors: Sebastian Cabot, Junius Matthews, Barbara Luddy, Howard Morris
